H0.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. Peter

H1.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. James

H2.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. Barnabas

H3.text: which apostle spoke at the council of jerusalem. Paul

A4.text: The Orthodox also hold that Peter did not act as leader at the Council of Jerusalem, but as merely one of a number who spoke.
